title: Circle of the Moon

BG3 Circle of the Moon Tips & Builds

Players can choose to get 1 level of Dragon Sorcerer for Circle of the Moon to get permanent Mage Armor which will boost up the base AC of your forms. Players may choose to grab a couple of utility spells. such as Feather Fall to combine with Druid's Enhanced Leap so your party won't take fall damage while jumping around.
